name: 林鼎然
objective: This course is expected to teach students the following knowledge: Matlab program foundation, digital image processing, image conversion, image enhancement, image restoration, image segmentation, image representation and description.
schedule:
week　　unit
1. 　　[Course introduction]
2. 　　Matlab introduction and 1-D signal vector processing (1)
3. 　　Matlab introduction and 1-D signal vector processing (2); 2-D signal matrix processing (1)
4.　　2-D signal matrix processing(2); program flow control
5.　　Spatial filtering
6.     Spatial filtering (1D); Spatial filtering (2D)
7.　　Fourier transform (FFT) (1D); Fourier transform (FFT) (2D)
8.　　[on-computer midterm]
9.　　[school midterm --- self review]
10.　　Frequency filtering (1D); Frequency filtering (2D); Filter design in frequency domain.
11.　　Affine transformation (1D); Affine transformation (2D)
12. 　　Affine transformation (2D); Interpolation (1D); Interpolation (2D)
13.　　Interpolation (1D&2D); Registration & stitching; Wavelet transformation I (1D)
14. 　　Wavelet transformation II (1D & Fast version FWT)
15. 　　Wavelet transformation III (1D& 2D)
16. 　　[Student final presentation]
17. 　　[on-computer final]
18. 　　[school final – self review]
scorePolicy:
On-computer midterm 30%
Student final presentation 20%
On-computer final 30%
Other (online activities, homework etc.) 20%
materials: Rafael C. Gonzalez, Richard E. Woods, Steven L. Eddins, “Digital Image Processing Using MATLAB 2/e”,
